description:
Trusted help when you need it most

Facing a criminal charge or suffering a serious injury can make it seem as though your whole world is upside down. At Bolinske Law Firm in Bismarck, North Dakota, we protect you when you need it most. Your concerns about your future and well-being are valid. No matter what the circumstances of your case may be, there is a risk when going through the legal process. Fortunately, our team has the experience and proven track record to give you peace of mind as we navigate your case.

Experience you can rely on

The founder of our law firm, Robert Bolinske Jr., has spent nearly two decades advocating for clients in criminal and civil matters. You can rest assured that:

•We have successfully resolved thousands of cases.

•Our team is fluent in litigation and negotiation tactics.

•We have returned millions of dollars to personal injury victims.

Mr. Bolinkse has been named to the Super Lawyers list, he holds an Avvo "Superb" rating, he has been listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100, and the National Academy of Criminal Defense Attorneys named him one of the Top 10 Criminal Attorneys in North Dakota.

Most importantly, when you come to us for help, we take care of everything. We want you to focus on recovering from your injury or the next steps for protecting your future. Bolinske Law Firm offers free initial consultations and accepts credit cards.
